title: I wish it was easier to preview skins
body:
I wish it was easier to see a skins in game looks, i'm sure there are plenty of sights on the internet but i can't be bothered to search up to find the most reliable image of the champ and skin,moften of which i won't find.
I was wondering if rito could just let us preview skins in-game looks from the lobby or profile-champions page, it would be easier than wasting 5 minutes of ur life on the internet only to find nothing cept innapropriatte (yer, great spelling right ther:) ) or worthless images.

Also Rito, i'm sorry if i violated ur universal rules, this is my first post and i only skimmed it.

replies.body: 'Awesome idea?' has a question mark in it, meaning that the people who voted for it are unsure if it is a good idea or not, leaving your poll with 3 no's and an unsure. What do you expect from someone who donsn't  know how to google?

It takes 5 seconds to find out what a skin looks like in game, literally 5 seconds, what is this 5 minutes bullshit ur on about? Stop being lazy and dumb, i say dumb because if you search for something as easy as this and don't find what you want then that's dumb.

Here have this, this is a well known site by like 90% of the playerbase and shows exactly what a skin looks like in game.

http://www.lolking.net/models

Have this a site that is also known by like 90% of the playerbase and shows any new content in League of Legends.

http://www.surrenderat20.net/

Here have a YouTube channel that shows skins.

https://www.youtube.com/user/SkinSpotlights


All this found in a span of 30 seconds.
yeah, that and the utube channel called SkinSpotlights
